snippet.title: Spellbound Survivors  - Launch Date Announcement Trailer | Steam
snippet.description:
Exciting Announcement: Unveiling Our Full Version Trailer!

We're thrilled to announce the launch of our full version trailer for Spellbound Survivors!

Dive deep into the heart of the game with an in-depth showcase featuring our new characters, each boasting unique attacks that promise an unparalleled gaming experience. This trailer is packed with details that will immerse you in the diverse and thrilling world of *Spellbound Survivors*. Get ready to unleash your skills in the Ultimate Challenge!

Available on 29 december, 2023 for $4.99!

We're delighted to announce that *Spellbound Survivors* is available for just $4.99! 

But wait, there's more – seize the opportunity to enjoy an exclusive 10% discount during the first week of launch. It's your chance to experience the magic of *Spellbound Survivors* at an even more enticing price. Don't miss out on this limited-time offer; **"Wishlist Now"** and dive into the battle of survival.

Beyond the Beta: Unveiling 70% More Content!

Add extra excitement to your journey! 
The beta version was just 30% of the game that you saw. Now, the full version goes beyond, delivering an immersive experience that surpasses expectations. The enchanting world of *Spellbound Survivors* awaits – embrace the magic and face the challenges head-on!

🔗 [Spellbound Survivors on Steam]

(https://store.steampowered.com/app/2602450/Spellbound_Survivors/)
